duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop state-of-the-art flow cytometry and potency assays for cell therapy products
Collaborate with team members to ensure high-quality functional assay development
Contribute to scientific strategy for regulatory acceptance of biological assays in clinical development
Generate and document results, experimental design, and execution
Collaborate with stakeholders on technical and strategic activities

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in immunology, cell biology, or related discipline (MS with relevant experience)
